analysis.description:
Reentrancy in Crowdsale.fallback (/unique_chucks/14/0x93a0b6206b2854866f9344e9c48a6b903b218779.sol#221-239):
	External calls:
	- token.mint(msg.sender,amount) (/unique_chucks/14/0x93a0b6206b2854866f9344e9c48a6b903b218779.sol#234-236)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- active (/unique_chucks/14/0x93a0b6206b2854866f9344e9c48a6b903b218779.sol#238)
	- hardCapReached (/unique_chucks/14/0x93a0b6206b2854866f9344e9c48a6b903b218779.sol#238)

Crowdsale.fallback (/unique_chucks/14/0x93a0b6206b2854866f9344e9c48a6b903b218779.sol#221-239) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(msg.sender,amount) (/unique_chucks/14/0x93a0b6206b2854866f9344e9c48a6b903b218779.sol#234-236)
